page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN TILSTON
page.content: Most people have to go out of the area for employment and the majority of workers travel between{10 and 20 {miles}to their places of employment. The main source of employment within the block is{farming,}which provide full time employment for about{10%}of the working population. There is a {dairy}nearby which packages milk. Part time{domestic work}is provided by some large houses, the two public houses and the school. Nowadays more people choose to live in the rural areas and most of these are employed in{Wrexham, the Wirral and in Chester. Several professional people live in the block. There is little employment for youngsters leaving school although this does not appear to be such a big problem here as it is in the nearby towns.
